Description: * Added new hero, {{PageRef|Mirage}}.
hero_mirage.png

* Added an initial Anti-Cheat detection system. When a user is detected as cheating, during the game session the opponents will be given a choice between banning the user immediately and ending the match or turning the cheater into a frog for the rest of the game and then banning them afterwards. The system is set to conservative detection levels as we work on a v2 anti-cheat system that is more extensive. We will turn on the banning of users in a couple of days after the update is out. When a match is ended this way, the results will not count for other players.
two_buttons_abrams.png

* Added global quickcast support. You can now configure your abilities and/or items to be on quickcast mode globally. You can also customize each ability individually to be quickcast or not. This also supports grenade style abilities.
* Hero specific keybinds now say the ability name instead of ability 1-4
* Added Zipline hotkey that can be independently bound from space/jump
* Fixed per-hero keys not inheriting user-defined default keys properly
* Added keybind indicator for hero-specific binds showing which keys have been bound for that hero
* Added Custom Match play mode
* Private lobbies now have an option to turn on cheats
* Private lobbies now let you select the specific servers to use
* Private lobbies now have an option to make the match publicly visible or private to only the players
* Private lobbies now support post-game and replays properly
* Private lobbies now allow picking specific lanes (solo and dual lane colors are displayed)
* Added a cheat report option in-game and post-game
* Can now mute and report enemy players using ESC while in-game

* Updated the game access invite UI to make it clear when users have been accepted (in most cases we look into where a user said their friend wasn't accepted, the user was actually accepted but they never claimed the game on the Steam notifications side)
* Added voice indicators for when players are speaking in party and team chat (green for party, white for team)
* Updated Player Card and action menu when clicking on a player in the friend list or ESC menu
* Fixed Rich Presence for Steam and in-game friend lists
* Party Code is now hidden when you enable Streamer Mode
* Added Region indicator to the matches on the watch tab
* Fixed search by MatchID not working for games that are live
* Added Spectator Fog of War toggle (hotkeys available in settings)
* Added South Africa servers
* Added Italian localization
* Instead of showing the total number of favorites for each build, we now tag popular builds using a mix of both recent and historical usage so that newer builds are easier to find
* Builds that haven't been updated in 30 days now have a distinct visual
* General rendering performance improvements
* Shadow quality improvements for higher shadow settings
* Fixed issues with player outline rendering in FSR2
* Fixed regression with saturation volumes outline not showing up
* Displacement mapping no longer an official option and will likely be cut (it can be enabled with a ConVar after the game starts)
* Lighting improvements in map
* Picking up a powerup will now list all the stats they modify in the HUD instead of a generic name like 'Casting' or 'Gun'
* Spirit scaling is now always shown on the tooltips without needing to hold alt/tab
* Updated {{PageRef|Viscous}} icon to look more different from {{PageRef|Dynamo}}
* Added frosted shell effect on the rejuv crystal when {{PageRef|Frozen Shelter}} is active
* Music and Sound effects will now pause during game pause
* Fixed {{PageRef|Guardian}} trying to shoot people unsuccessfully behind cover
* Fixed {{PageRef|Quicksilver Reload}} bonus damage not working correctly with things like {{PageRef|Scorn}} and {{PageRef|Flog}}
* Added timer sound to the last couple seconds of {{PageRef|Flying Cloak}}
* Wall Jumps now use better animations to communicate directionality
* Fixed jumping between ziplines consuming stamina
* Fixed Magic Reverb not getting increased bonus damage from damage amps
* Improved preloading during queue time
* Updated {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} effects
* Updated {{PageRef|Lightning Ball}} effects to reduce some visual noise
* Fixed some issues with {{PageRef|Crimson Slash}} effect not appearing reliably
* {{PageRef|Viscous}} {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} will now show a red preview for when the punch is out of range but within 2x of the cast range
* Fixed {{PageRef|Ricochet}} not respecting LOS when picking the targets
* No longer play low ammo sounds when firing while sliding
* Fixed not being able to bind Reload to Mouse Wheel Up/Down
* Minimap line colors now match the color of the hero drawing them
* Fixed spectator keybinds not showing correctly
* Updated {{PageRef|Flying Strike}} effects to reduce some visual noise
* Fixed Flex Slot unlock order not matching the usual order of unlocks
* Updated {{PageRef|Sleep Dagger}} projectile, impact and sleeping debuff visuals
* Fixed imbue and active abilities dialog not responding to keybinds if your ability/item binds included a modifier key or were bound to the mouse wheel
* Fixed {{PageRef|Dynamo}} not playing an animation during the cast delay on {{PageRef|Singularity}}
* Updated bullet shield break effects
* Updated {{PageRef|Unstoppable}} effects to be clearer at cast time
* {{PageRef|Warp Stone}}: Casting while on the ground will no longer stop the player in place, will try to move forward along the ground instead
* {{PageRef|Warp Stone}}: Fixed cases of {{PageRef|Warp Stone}} getting caught on geometry
* Fixed various projectiles going through bosses ({{PageRef|Wraith}} cards, Geist bombs, etc)
* Fixed Dash not always breaking breakables
* Breakables will now wait to spawn if a player is in the way
* {{PageRef|Abrams}} now has a new custom heavy melee animation
* Updated {{PageRef|Haze}} VO
* Fixed a bug where {{PageRef|Kelvin}} desperation VO for {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} and {{PageRef|Ice Path}} were flipped
* Turned off a {{PageRef|Shiv}} line where he referenced slowing down enemies when he wasn't actually doing so

* Removed reason 31 of why {{PageRef|Lash}} is better than {{PageRef|Bebop}} and replaced it with reason 26 of why {{PageRef|Lash}} is better than {{PageRef|Bebop}} (fixed a bug with {{PageRef|Lash}}'s hero select lines)
* Replaced a {{PageRef|Grey Talon}} select line to make his intentions more clear
* {{PageRef|Infernus}} will no longer appear in every bot match
* Bots can now choose to play {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}, {{PageRef|Mirage}}, {{PageRef|Shiv}}, and {{PageRef|Warden}}
* Fixed min/max falloff range displaying incorrectly on Weapon Stats Tooltip
* Updated {{PageRef|Rejuvenator}} buff effect
* Updated wall bounce effects for {{PageRef|Viscous}} in ball form
* Added citadel_give_gold cheat command
* Improved read on the connecting rope for {{PageRef|Flying Strike}} and reduced visual obstruction of the ending slash
* Music bug fixes for replay and spectating
* Allow announcer lines for kill streaks and various hero lines to play while the player is in an active combat encounter
* Timing critical music and sfx will pause and resume in response to game pause
* Side lanes are now a little further apart from the middle lanes
* Added a First Blood bonus bounty for the first kill each player gets. Grants 150 bonus souls.
* Lane setup is now always 1-2-2-1
* Zipline Boost now starts on cooldown again
* {{PageRef|Trooper}} damage reduction from {{PageRef|Guardian}}s reduced from 35% to 28% (they die a little faster to {{PageRef|Guardian}}s now)
* {{PageRef|Trooper}} share radius reduced (from allied hero to allied hero 50m->40m, from orb to allied hero 40m->35m)
* Reverted recent creep sharing duplication changes (back to how it was over a week ago, we want to see if it's still an issue with the other changes in this patch)
* Some latency-related calculation improvements that help orbs be a little less deny favored
* Orbs now appear a little smaller to the enemy that is trying to deny them

* Added a Soul Generator (like the one in hero sandbox) in the respawn area. Starts spawning orbs at 3 minutes. Each orb is worth 10 souls when shot. (primary purpose for this is cases when you are very close to an item purchase)
* Fire Rate slows now stack diminishingly
* Rejuv bonus creep HP increased from 50% to 70%
* Rejuv bonus is no longer consumed for dead players, they have it on their next life now
* {{PageRef|Trooper}}s no longer give half bounty when base guardians are destroyed for that lane
* Killer to Assist bounty ratio reduced from 2.0 to 1.7 (slightly more to assists)
* Midgame respawn time increased a bit (reaches 50s at 20 min instead of 40s at 20 min)
* Teleporter delay reduced from 5s to 4s
* {{PageRef|Guardian}}s now deal 10% more damage to players
* Sinner's Sacrifice now grants a permanent golden statue bonus when it is killed
* Fixed Sinner's Sacrifice sharing bounty to nearby allies
* Added indicator on the hud to help track your passive cooldown items when they are 1s from ready (headshot Booster, Medic Bullets, etc)
* Boon count increased from 11 to 14 (added to 16/18/20k)
* Non-Health boon bonuses rescaled over the 14 levels (same total as before)
* Aggressive crouch spamming within a very narrow window will now cause you to very briefly move progressively slower
* Added Rejuv drop on a loop in the sandbox mode
* Added infinite ammo option to sandbox ("No Reload")
* Fixed dashing downwards not destroying breakables
* Silence now deselects your ability if you had it open when silenced
* {{PageRef|Monster Rounds}}: Bullet Resist vs NPCs reduced from 35% to 30%
* {{PageRef|High-Velocity Mag}}: Bullet Velocity reduced from +30% to +25%
* {{PageRef|Restorative Shot}}: Cooldown reduced from 6.2s to 5.5s
* {{PageRef|Hollow Point Ward}}: Spirit Shield increased from +85 to +95
* {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}}: Fire Rate reduced from +5% to +4%
* {{PageRef|Kinetic Dash}}: Fire Rate reduced from 25% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Kinetic Dash}}: Fire Rate max duration reduced from 8s to 7s
* {{PageRef|Berserker}}: Damage required per stack reduced from 110 to 100
* {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}}: Damage spirit scaling increased from 0.6 to 0.8
* {{PageRef|Melee Charge}}: Impact now increases your ammo for that mag instead of reloading (so if your ammo is 2/8, it becomes 10/8). Reloads you instantly if in the middle of a reload.
* {{PageRef|Melee Charge}}: Cooldown increased from 8.5s to 10s
* {{PageRef|Intensifying Magazine}}: Max Weapon Damage reduced from 75% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Escalating Resilience}}: Fire Rate reduced from 14% to 12%
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Now requires {{PageRef|Headshot Booster}}
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: No longer grants +50% Bullet Velocity
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Now grants +5% Fire Rate
* {{PageRef|Headhunter}}: Fixed not being affected by cooldown reduction
* {{PageRef|Pristine Emblem}}: Now requires {{PageRef|High-Velocity Mag}}
* {{PageRef|Pristine Emblem}}: Now grants +35% Bullet Velocity
* {{PageRef|Titanic Magazine}}: Ammo increased from 100% to 120%
* {{PageRef|Sharpshooter}}: Fixed falloff reduction not working properly
* {{PageRef|Frenzy}}: Low HP Spirit Resist changed to Bullet Resist
* {{PageRef|Spiritual Overflow}}: Now grants +250 Bullet Shield
* {{PageRef|Silencer}}: Now grants +12 Spirit
* {{PageRef|Ricochet}}: Fire Rate reduced from 12% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Vampiric Burst}}: Fixed casting it interrupting sliding
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Moved to T4 Vitality
* {{PageRef|Shadow Weave}}: Now a T4 Weapon Item
* {{PageRef|Melee Lifesteal}}: Melee Damage reduced from 13% to 12%
* {{PageRef|Melee Lifesteal}}: Heal vs non-heroes reduced from 40% to 30%
* {{PageRef|Extra Stamina}}: Stamina Recovery increased from 10% to 14%
* {{PageRef|Restorative Locket}}: No longer requires max stacks to restore a stamina point
* {{PageRef|Divine Barrier}}: Bonus Health reduced from 75 to 50
* {{PageRef|Combat Barrier}}: Fire Rate while shielded reduced from 8% to 6%
* {{PageRef|Combat Barrier}}: Weapon Damage while shielded reduced from 28% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Combat Barrier}}: Bullet Shield increased from +300 to +325
* Health Nova: Weapon Damage increased from 10% to 12%
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: While active grants +25% Bullet Resistance
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Bullet Damage Returned reduced from 70% to 60%
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: No longer grants +7% Fire Rate
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Spirit Power increased from +7 to +9
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Ricochet}}'d bullets not returning the right amount of damage
* {{PageRef|Bullet Armor}}: Bullet Resist increased from 20% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Veil Walker}}: No longer grants +20% Fire Rate
* Improved {{PageRef|Bullet Armor}}: Bullet Resist increased from 45% to 50%
* {{PageRef|Fortitude}}: Bonus Health increased from 275 to 300
* {{PageRef|Lifestrike}}: Cooldown reduced from 5.25s to 5s
* {{PageRef|Lifestrike}}: Fixed proccing heal more than once when hitting multiple targets
* {{PageRef|Shadow Weave}}: Moved to T4 Weapon
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Now a T4 Vitality Item
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: No longer grants +28% Weapon Damage
* {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}}: Now grants +18% Bullet Resistance
* {{PageRef|Colossus}}: Slow radius increased from 12m to 14m
* {{PageRef|Soul Rebirth}}: Increases base respawn rate by +15s
* {{PageRef|Unstoppable}}: Can no longer be cast during channels
* {{PageRef|Ammo Scavenger}}: Ammo reduced from 15% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Ammo Scavenger}}: Health reduced from 60 to 40
* {{PageRef|Ammo Scavenger}}: Duration reduced from 35s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Ammo Scavenger}}: Max stacks reduced from 12 to 10
* {{PageRef|Spirit Strike}}: No longer grants +0.8 Health Regen
* {{PageRef|Mystic Reach}}: Ability Range increased from 16% to 18%
* {{PageRef|Mystic Reach}}: Now provides 6% Bullet Resist instead of 6% Spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: No longer grants +8% Fire Rate
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Spirit Power increased from +4 to +6
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Now grants +1 Sprint
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Cast range increased from 24m to 30m
* {{PageRef|Withering Whip}}: Fire Rate slow increased from 40% to 45%
* {{PageRef|Quicksilver Reload}}: No longer triggers if your ammo is at max value already
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Cooldown increased from 32s to 45s
* {{PageRef|Decay}}: Cast range scaling reduced from 0.2 to 0.16
* {{PageRef|Improved Reach}}: Now provides 12% Bullet Resist instead of 12% Spirit Resist
* {{PageRef|Improved Spirit}}: Spirit Power increased from +21 to +23
* {{PageRef|Knockdown}}: Now causes enemies to fall down faster
* {{PageRef|Torment Pulse}}: Health Bonus increased from 140 to 160
* {{PageRef|Torment Pulse}}: Spirit Power damage scaling increased from 0.25 to 0.33
* {{PageRef|Rapid Recharge}}: Faster Time Between Charges increased from +55% to +65%
* {{PageRef|Rapid Recharge}}: Cooldown Reduction For Charged Abilities increased from +25% to 30%
* {{PageRef|Magic Carpet}}: Fixed it consuming stamina when jumping off
* {{PageRef|Escalating Exposure}}: Fixed the bonus damage being reduced twice by resistance
* {{PageRef|Refresher}}: Bullet Resist increased from 8% to 16%
* {{PageRef|Refresher}}: Spirit Resist reduced from 16% to 8%
* {{PageRef|Echo Shard}}: Now has a 0.3s cast delay (like {{PageRef|Refresher}})
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Infernal Resilience}} reduced from 16% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Infernal Resilience}} T3 reduced from 9% to 8%
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: {{PageRef|Siphon Life}} spirit scaling increased from 0.2 to 0.3
* {{PageRef|Abrams}}: Fixed Cases where {{PageRef|Shoulder Charge}} was unexpectedly 'slamming' in to walls and stairs
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Hook}} range reduced from 30m to 25m
* {{PageRef|Bebop}}: {{PageRef|Hyper Beam}} duration spirit scaling reduced from 0.08 to 0.06
* {{PageRef|Dynamo}}: {{PageRef|Singularity}} radius reduced from 8m to 7m
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: Arrow cycle time reduced from 0.4s to 0.45s (overall dps unchanged)
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Rain of Arrows}} can be alternate-casted to remain near the ground
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: Fixed air dash during {{PageRef|Rain of Arrows}} going half the distance
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} bonus spirit on death now has a 3s buffer window
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}}: very slight turn rate improvements
* {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}: {{PageRef|Guided Owl}} radius increased from 12m to 13m
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: Sleep dagger hitbox reduced by 10%
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: Fixed refresher not working properly with {{PageRef|Smoke Bomb}}
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: Fixed some items that didn't proc before: {{PageRef|Tesla Bullets}}, {{PageRef|Lucky Shot}}, {{PageRef|Mystic Shot}}
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} now more accurately shows who it is shooting
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} sometimes not obeying line of sight accurately
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} bullets are now affected by {{PageRef|Time Wall}}
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} evasion reduced from 50% to 25%
* {{PageRef|Haze}}: {{PageRef|Bullet Dance}} fire rate reduced from 25% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Stone Form}} now works against airborne targets
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} T3 now also grants +2m Radius
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Kudzu Bomb}} spirit power scaling increased from 0.6 to 0.7
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: Fixed clicking noise when flying while disarmed
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: Fixed being able to {{PageRef|Stone Form}} during the Take {{PageRef|Flight}} animation to circumvent the vulnerable cast period
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Headshot bonus damage reduced by 20%
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Bullet damage growth reduced from 1.2 to 0.9
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: {{PageRef|Arctic Beam}} movement slow reduced from 70% to 50%
* {{PageRef|Kelvin}}: Moving through breakables while on {{PageRef|Ice Path}} now destroys them
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Life Drain}} cooldown reduced from 42s to 30s
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Malice}} cooldown reduced from 6.25s to 6s
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: {{PageRef|Malice}} T1 improved from -2.75s Cooldown to -3s
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Life Drain}} not healing extra based on amplifications (like Soul Shredder and {{PageRef|Malice}} stacks)
* {{PageRef|Lady Geist}}: Sprint increased from 1 to 1.5
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: Fixed looking up circumventing the min range on Wall and {{PageRef|Barrage}}
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: Can now cast parry to cancel your ult
* {{PageRef|McGinnis}}: Fixed various issues with {{PageRef|Spectral Wall}} indoors and near walls spawning the wrong number of segments
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} duration reduced from 2.75s to 2.5s
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} damage spirit scaling increased from 0.8 to 1.1
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Combo}} kill trigger now has a 3s buffer window to get credit
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Sand Blast}} T1 reduced from +1.5s to +1s
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Sand Blast}} range increased from 30m to 35m
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Burrow}} base speed increased from 3 to 4
* {{PageRef|Mo & Krill}}: {{PageRef|Burrow}} T3 speed reduced from +3 to +2
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: {{PageRef|Pulse Grenade}} T3 now also grants +2% Damage Amp
* {{PageRef|Paradox}}: Fixed being unable to be damaged by multiple {{PageRef|Time Wall}}s
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Affliction}} no longer goes through walls, now respects line of sight
* {{PageRef|Pocket}}: {{PageRef|Barrage}} T3 reduced from +5% to +4%
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Static Charge}} stun duration reduced from 1.1 to 0.9
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Static Charge}} T3 reduced from 1.1 to 0.9
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Static Charge}} radius reduced from 6m to 5m
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Static Charge}} can now be alternate-casted on self (does not stun you)
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Static Charge}} now respects line of sight
* {{PageRef|Seven}}: {{PageRef|Lightning Ball}} T3 now also gives +1m Radius
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Slice and Dice}} T2 reduced from +85 to +75
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} Rage buildup per spirit damage reduced from 0.02 to 0.013
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} Rage drain rate increased from 0.3 to 0.35
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} Full Rage Bonus Damage reduced from 20% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Killing Blow}} T2 increased from 5% to 10%
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Gun cycle time increased from 0.19s to 0.22s (same overall dps)
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Stake}}: distance enemies are allowed to move increased from 6m to 8m
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Max Falloff reduced from 58m to 45m
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Flight}} ending if you touch the ground
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: Low HP indication now also shows up while unscoped
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Assassinate}} Base damage reduced from 160 to 140
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Assassinate}} zoom level reduced a little bit
* {{PageRef|Vindicta}}: {{PageRef|Flight}} duration spirit scaling reduced from 0.2 to 0.15
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|The Cube}} cleanse is now part of the T2
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Puddle Punch}} enemy warning time increased from 0.35s to 0.45s
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Bullet Damage reduced from 13 to 12
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Can now use down dash during {{PageRef|Goo Ball}}
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: Fixed {{PageRef|Phantom Strike}} not positioning you correctly when using it with your {{PageRef|Goo Ball}}
* {{PageRef|Viscous}}: {{PageRef|Splatter}} post cast delay reduced from 0.5s to 0.2s
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Binding Word}} escape range and escape time increased by 15%
* {{PageRef|Warden}}: {{PageRef|Last Stand}} spirit scaling increased from 0.9 to 1.2
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.5 to 0.45
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Crimson Slash}} fire rate slow reduced from 30% to 20%
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: Fixed various issues with {{PageRef|Flying Strike}} pathing
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} duration reduced from 5s to 4.5s
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} T3 duration increased from +1.5s to +2s
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} no longer provides unlimited ammo
* Outer lanes at the middle of the map pushed further away from the inner lanes
* Added connection from canal near the urn platforms through the Radio Station and Apartment buildings
radio_station_connection.jpg
* Reworked interior corridors of Fish Market/Nursery to exit to the buildings sooner
* Added interior room partition from the Fish Market/Nursery to the Shops
* Moved rope to the Fish Market/Nursery rooftop to the back of the building
* Removed upper interior hallway from rope to the Fish Market/Nursery rooftops
* Moved truck from in front of archway with cosmic veil to the back of the Fish Market/Nursery
fish_market_changes.jpg
* Redesigned outer lane path (ziplines and trooper nodes) from {{PageRef|Walker}} to {{PageRef|Guardian}} on Amber Yellow and Sapphire Purple
amber_yellow_patch.png
amber_purple_patch.png
* Added interior passage beside Subway Entrance to the outer lanes
subway_entrance_connection.jpg
